text: Centromadia perennis is a species of Mexican plants in the tarweed tribe within the sunflower family. It is native to the State of Baja California Sur in western Mexico. The initial discovery of the species was near Boca del Salado in the East Cape Region near the south end of the peninsula.Greene, Edward Lee. 1896. Pittonia 3: 26 ==References== ==External links== Category:Flora of Baja California Sur Category:Plants described in 1896 Category:Madieae
title: Centromadia perennis
